## Primary Data Source
**World Bank Climate Data**  
- **Dataset**: CO₂ Emissions (kt)  
- **Timeframe**: 1960–2020  
- **Indicator Code**: `EN.ATM.CO2E.KT`  
- **URL**: [https://climateknowledgeportal.worldbank.org](https://climateknowledgeportal.worldbank.org)  
- **Download Method**: Direct CSV download via World Bank API  

## Methodology
1. **Data Cleaning**:
   - Removed metadata columns (`Indicator Name`, `Indicator Code`)
   - Handled missing values with `drop_na()`
   - Standardized country names across years

2. **Analysis**:
   - Top emitters identified by 2020 values
   - Cumulative emissions calculated using `sum(CO2_kt)`
